name: Wi-Fi Hotspot Data Widget
description: The widget intended to enable/disable Wi-Fi Hotspot and the monitoring the device adapters (Wi-Fi adapter, data transfer over cellular).  Implemented: 1) option to enable of the configured hotspot after the system boot; 2) display a list of the connected devices; 3) enabling/disabling the configured Wi-Fi hotspot; 4) enabling/disabling of the Wi-Fi adapter; 5) enabling/disabling data transfer over the cellular network; 6) on/off the Airplane mode; 7) ability to change the background color of the widget; 8) display of the number of devices that have been connected to the Wi-Fi hotspot.  The options to enable/disable data transfer over the cellular and on/off the Airplane mode by one-click is not supported with Android 5.0 and above.
